__e: Well, I am telling you, with 100% certainty... that it is not the time.
If there's any truth to it, then I now know with certainty that the path I'm on is the right one.
I mean, if you can see it with the level of certainty I have that, even better.
I'm seeking a conviction. I must follow the trail to speak to her.
And if you're like me, you're angry about it because your life was your own, and your career was about knowing and certainty and clarity.
We aren't supposed to know, not for certain, and I think that's the point.
Well, I think we can safely say that there's something going on with you, Buffy.
I can't say for sure that he lives there but that's where I saw them.
New to you, too, I see. We're not sure what the hell he is, but we do know he's a cold-blooded killer.
I have any real sense of how or... why she disappeared.
I miss the warmth and the knowing what's right and that you're doing it just by loving her.
Ben, I'm a twice-divorced criminal attorney, and there's two things I know with certainty... one, your wife is hiding cash, and, two, there's a lot more of it.
